name: overmedicated
text: I would pay 600 fatties to see some 18th century ankle. Hell yes I would.

name: equinn2006
text: Thank you. That is always nice to hear.

text:
hee hee ha ha...

Incidentally, I wrote a really blowhard-y artsy literary interpretation of that painting which is your avatar...now I can't remember the artist's name. *sigh*

text: Rene Magritte. Or as my friends know him 'That Apple Guy'.

text: Ceci n'est pas une pomme.

text: it was originally...but read the comment before mine. I'm being snarky.

text: apples

text: Every once in a while, there is a man who is the right man for his time.

text: He is not such a man.

text: He is such an apple... s.

text: 19th century.

name: overmedicated
text: Bollocks. I'm with Izzard on this one.

name: lizjones
text: Perhaps it features Lavendar "Catfish" Cavendish

name: nyu
text: If Ray Smuckles made the Forbes Richest list, his "source of wealth" would be: Music Production and Antique Erotica

name: deimosrising
text: A comment left by deimosrising was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by professorhazard, regrepsnefpoh, perhapsmaybe)

name: catachresis
text:
I don't know about the US version of Antiques Roadshow but it looks like Patrick Moore is the presenter.
Which also makes this strip more awesome

name: riazm
text: I was meant to get a talk by Patrick Moore in secondary school but he chickened out . I hold this against him, that talk would have been so cool.

name: horace_lung
text: This, to me, is the quintessence of Ray Smuckles.  That cat always lands on his feet.

name: norrin
text: He has a way of falling ass-backwards into more prosperity. While Beef lives in squalor.

name: waddlerz
text: Except when getting his BONE on

name: untilyouaresonude
text: Just ahead on Antiques Roadshow: A guy with a wrench in his head!

name: tekende
text: I estimate that at auction this wrench, with the head attached, would fetch over $11,000.

name: never_die
text: ain't it neat?  this old timey porno?

name: straw
text: Just another source of Ray's extreme wealth

name: evolume
text: At first, in panel 6, i read "felch."

name: moraiat
text: eewwwww

name: shadowlink_97
text: yum :)

name: riazm
text: Not Pictured: Teodor hitting himself with a rake.

name: skiddyfisk
text: I love his thought process as to calculating the value. Dude knows his porno.

name: tekende
text: Thank you. That is always nice to hear.

name: i_love_kate
text: One of my top five ever strips. Deserves a higher rating, without a doubt.

name: i_love_kate
text: (This is no longer the case. Just so's you know.)

name: landowmpg
text: Whenever I read this strip I burst out laughing, and I don't find every strip laugh-out-loud funny, especially if I'm by myself, even the ones I really like. Just Ray's total nonchalance, the cliche "That is always nice to hear" that everyone says on Antiques Roadshow, and the way the guy cuts Ray off mid-sentence at the end. Pure gold.

name: deancain29
text: is this how Ray becomes rich?

name: bophur
text: No.

name: rowboat
text: This is how he got richer.

name: c_dizzle
text: WHY can't I ever see something like this on the ARS?

name: professorhazard
text: Is Ray covering his nipples for television?

name: bartleby
text: I...I think he might be. Nice catch.

name: wonelove
text: They can display an antique porno but not his nipples.

name: epicurus
text: The Antique Roadshow guy knows when to cut a fella off.

name: spectre
text: If the Lady is about to be spanked, it might be worth more to me, but I would need to know what she did that was Naughty.

name: sweetlips
text: How is this only a 4.3?!

name: goddessdictator
text: i'm not sure how the alt text hasn't merited a comment but i agree i too have cried when an egg cup got $55.

name: desert_donkey
text: "six hundred million dollars".. LOLS. i gave this one a 5. fucking straight flush to the ace.

name: icecube
text: exactly. by sheer absurdity, it's one of the most "lol" punchlines this strip has ever had

name: icecube
text: Shit. I say strip, but I mean webcomic. What can you do?

name: tekende
text: 600 million dollars. Do you have any idea how much fucking money that is? Seriously. NOTHING is worth that much money, except countries and large corporations, intangible things like that.

name: boredom_man
text: Only things which do not exist can be worth more money than is in circulation.

name: landowmpg
text: It cracks me up how ridiculously huge the figure is.  Even if it is valuable, someone would have to BUY it.  Like there's some antique porn afficionado out there with more than half a billion dollars to throw around on something like this.

name: mbain3001
text: I love porn, but not that much.Then again, I also love old stuff..... hmmmmmmm

name: riotdejaneiro
text: I love how Ray leans into the microphone in the 4th panel. To tell the guy that it's nice to hear that he owns antique erotica.

name: link
text: Oh hell, I won't even bother to fork out $5 for prono. 600 mil, though.. hell.
